SummaryEnglish: In the continent of spooner, sorcerers, who are the continent's aristocrats, have begun to abuse their powers. Under the guidance of Big Momma (their boss) Carrot (who turns into a giant monster every time he's placed under a magic spell), Gateau (a bodybuilder), Marron (a mage), Chocolate and Tira (who can transform into dominatrix's at will) must stop the evil sorcerers from picking on the weak. However, none of them (except maybe Marron) have a clue to what’s going on.

0.TitleEnglish: 元祖 爆れつハンター
0.SummaryEnglish: TVアニメ「爆れつハンター」の放送後にOVA化されたあかほりさとるの人気小説を原作にした作品。露出度がアップしたショコラやティラのコスチューム、そして彼らの性格もより原作に近くなり、TVシリーズとはひと味違う魅力が満載！ パワーアップしたキャロットたちが、新たな騒動を巻き起こす!!

1.TitleEnglish: The Night of the Night Visits!
1.SummaryEnglish: When Carrot tries to seduce a lovely older woman (while Chocolate is trying to seduce Carrot), a steamy hot springs vacation gets steamier... and funnier.

2.SummaryEnglish: Our heroes leap into battle with the Death Master, an evil necromancer who's transformed an entire town into his willing zombie slaves!

3.SummaryEnglish: An ancient tree with legendary romantic powers turns a relaxing picnic into a love-crazed free-for-all! Can even the Sorcerer Hunters handle this kind of heat?

4.TitleEnglish: Sorcerer on the Rocks: My Master Is a Real Wretch

5.TitleEnglish: Sorcerer on the Rocks: Even the Pure Maiden Is a Real Wretch

1.SummaryEnglish: Carrot and the gang are after a sorcerer who is trying to revive the dragon, Gamuru. Gamuru feeds on girls who are filled with fear, pain, and hate. Young women are being kidnapped to feed this dragon.

2.SummaryEnglish: The magic flower, Metasenia, has the power to possess the soul of a person and suck the life out of them. After it has absorbed the person's soul, it produces a being that takes on the personality of that soul. Once used to produce great soldiers, the Metasenia has since been banned. Now, there is a sorcerer who uses the flower to produce the ""perfect"" man, and it's the Sorcerer Hunters' job to stop her.

3.TitleEnglish: The Unwritten Law of Light and Dark
3.SummaryEnglish: This time, there is a sorcerer who is trying to build a collection. What exactly is she collecting?  And whom is Big Mama talking to in the past about all this stuff about changing the world? We uncover a sinister plot, while the Sorcerer Hunters punish an evil sorcerer.

4.SummaryEnglish: Doesn't everyone want to compete in the fireworks competition? Well, Carrot certainly does, because Bomber is waiting for him there. She has actually invited him to this fireworks competition. Of course this doesn't make Chocolate and Tira very happy. Find out what they plan to do about it.

5.SummaryEnglish: This is a lovely story about a boy, a girl, a woman and an old lady. Carrot, as usual, finds himself in trouble with Chocolate and Tira for chasing after some cute girl, but this time it appears that the girl actually welcomes his attention. What's going on here?

6.TitleEnglish: The Heresy of Love is Crystal
6.SummaryEnglish: The Sorcerer Hunters are given the task of stopping whoever is turning the young girls to crystal with Kinju magic. However, there's a twist to this story: the sorcerer turns out to be an overprotective brother rather than a sorcerer. What is this all about?

7.SummaryEnglish: Have you ever heard of the Magic River of Holy Light? There's a legend about this river and the ceremony of Spirit Rock Float. It says that you set a rock full of spirit adrift upstream, as it flows downward, the stone is bounced and scraped along the bed of the River of Holy Light. If it comes out shaped like a human being, then the rock becomes the Messiah and saves the people of the world from poverty and misfortune. Does this all make sense? Well, watch it and find out.

8.SummaryEnglish: What happens when an evil sorcerer starts to do some good for the town? You try to find out what he is up to.  And that is just what the Sorcerer Hunters are supposed to do in this episode. An evil sorcerer is in town claiming that he is saving the town from the monsters that might attack and hurt their children. But in fact, he is doing something much worse.

9.SummaryEnglish: In this episode we find out a little about Gateau's past. He didn't always travel around with the rest of the gang. He had a partner named Opera. What happened to her and what is Gato going to do about it? He tries to get some revenge for the past..

10.SummaryEnglish: In this episode, an evil sorcerer has a gambling hall and seems to be killing people. So the Sorcerer Hunters are given the task of righting this wrong, but Carrot has his own agenda.

11.SummaryEnglish: Two brothers long for their deceased parents, so they decide to get replacements. However, their procedure is rather unconventional.  Watch and find out!

12.SummaryEnglish: A dragon threatens to destroy a town that's been built around him. Big Mama assigns Carrot and the gang to put the dragon to sleep for another eon or two, but an old man in the town has a scheme of his own. He wants to kill the dragon and end the town's fear once and for all. But wait, didn't Big Mama say there was no way to kill it?!

13.SummaryEnglish: The Sorcerer Hunters get trapped inside this mystical fairy book and well...anything that can happen does. It will make your dreams come true..

14.SummaryEnglish: The Sorcerer Hunters are called upon to defeat a beast that threatens a town, but when they arrive, they are told to cancel their mission by the very people who requested their help. What is going on here? And who is the poor woman who everyone keeps taking advantage of, tricking and abusing? Has God forsaken her?

15.SummaryEnglish: Zaha Torte bursts onto the scene. He is off amassing power in preparation for...Well, I can't tell you what for. But Big Mama is out to stop him, only someone gets in her way and confuses matters. Find out what Zaha Torte is up to. See how the Sorcerer Hunters fit into all of this.

16.SummaryEnglish: Poor Carrot is hurt and has to go to the hospital of love where the only staff is two very sexy young women. Suddenly Gateau finds himself sick too. Gateau comes onto Marron again. Marron turns him down again. Chocolate has a fantasy about herself being Carrot's nurse. then it is discovered that these two girls hate ALL MEN and must punish ALL MEN b-cuz they believe ALL MEN are evil. Gateau makes sure to repeat ALL MEN as much as possible. So do they save Carrrot from the women's clutches? No, he deserves it anyway.

17.SummaryEnglish: The big fortress is active once more, and the Sorcerer Hunters have been summoned to stop it. Is it too powerful for them to handle, and guess what happens when Carrot tries to change forms after getting struck by its magic? What does all of this have to do with Big Mama?

18.SummaryEnglish: Zaha Torte has made a pact with a Magical Engineer. Zaha frees the engineer from the bonds that keep him from using his magic in exchange for the assassination of the Sorcerer Hunters. The mission seems suicidal; what is Zaha up to? He is looking for something and believes he can find it in one of the Sorcerer Hunters.

19.SummaryEnglish: The Sorcerer Hunters come upon a famous painter who can see into people and bring out their best qualities in his paintings.  An evil sorcerer is trying to take advantage of the painter's gift by stealing his paintings to sell for a high price. The Sorcerer Hunters can't just sit around watching this happen, can they?

20.SummaryEnglish: A little boy's father is murdered before his very eyes, and the boy wants revenge. How is he to get it? Well, Carrot decides to help him out, but why would Carrot help anyone who isn't female? And why are they all dressed up as women?!

21.SummaryEnglish: Zaha Torte and the Haz Knights face off, while Carrot, Chocolate and Tira are all sleeping together and exploring...their feelings...yeah, that's it! What is wrong with this picture?

22.TitleEnglish: The Spirits of the Sorcerer Hunters
22.SummaryEnglish: On the way to meet with Big Mama at the Stella Church, Carrot is emotionally torn as he begins to wonder why he is even hunting sorcerers. Is it because he wants to help the common folk, or is it because Big Mama says to, orâ€¦? Or is he just making this up, so that he can trick the rest of the gang into letting him stay in a town full of beautiful women? I think you know the answer.

23.SummaryEnglish: Carrot and the gang have made it back to the Stella church. What does Big Mama have in mind that she needed to see them about it personally, and why didn't she just transport them there like she usually does. She needed that time to think over her decision.  It's not an easy one to make. What is happening? Zaha saves Carrot's life?!

24.SummaryEnglish: The Sorcerer Hunters know that they have to fight Zaha Torte. They also know they have little or no chance of winning, yet they go to meet him anyways. This is the beginning of their big showdown. Who will triumph?

25.SummaryEnglish: They continue their battle with Zaha. What big secrets are to be revealed? Why is Zaha coming after Carrot? What is this ""Destroyer"" everyone is talking about?

26.TitleEnglish: The Lost Item from the Future
26.SummaryEnglish: I don't want to spoil everything by saying what will happen in this last episode. Let's just say that they have a nearly full-length version of the ending song during the middle of the episode. If that isn't reason enough to watch it, I don't know what is.
